column4: Hi I,m having some problems with resolutions in ubuntu I have a new marantz receiver with hdmi, but nvidia/ubuntu will only let me set 640x480 as max res. anyone who knows how to fix this? e.g how to add resolutions in xorg.conf, i have trieed but they wont show...
you have your graphic driver installed and configured properly?
yes ubuntu 11.10 with nvidia 280.?? and nvidia settings but no option for resolution over 640x480
its been a while since I've had to configure a nvidia device but it seems like from my memory you have to do 2 separate configs
